title: Person of Interest: Season 5 Teaser - NYCC 2015
author: IGN
comment: The Best Teaser That I Ever Seen!
There is no problem with The Machine, she just has a great sense of humour and a taste for Root in suits!
I bet the cast had way too much fun filming this and playing around with each other's maneirisms. :D

R.I.P. me because I just died laughing!! On a side note, am I the only concerned for Shaw? I need my Root/Shaw!! It's my favorite part of the show!
Also Amy in a suit? That was so funny, I can't wait for this season!!
Amy Acker's version of Harold is so vivid! What a face of humor!
description: Straight from New York Comic Con, check out this new footage where the team discovers trouble inside the Machine.
